SIGIntegrator

The SIGIntegrator is designed for be called from SICECAT II and needs to be initialized in SiceCAT SIG client.

Inherits from

  • <OpenLayers.Class>
Summary
SIGIntegratorThe SIGIntegrator is designed for be called from SICECAT II and needs to be initialized in SiceCAT SIG client.
Properties
controls{Object} The controls to interact with the map
layer{OpenLayers.Layer.Vector} layer for the geometries
Functions
IntegradorVisorSIGCreates an IntegradorVisorSIG object
drawCircleDraw a circle in this.layer
importPointImport a point to this.layer
deletePointDraw a point at this.layer
modifyPointModify a point defined in this.layer
importPolygonImport the polygon defined in csv file to this.layer
importPointsImports all points defined in csv file to this.layer
deletePointsDeletes all points defined in csv file of this.layer
clearCleans this.layer

lat)

Import a point to this.layer

Parameters

lon{<Double>} point’s longitude
lat{<Double>} point’s latitude

modifyPoint

modifyPoint: function(lonOld,
latOld,
lonNew,
latNew)

Modify a point defined in this.layer

Parameters

lonOld{<Double>} old value of point’s longitude to modify
latOld{<Double>} old value of point’s latitude to modify
lonNew{<Double>} new value of point’s longitude
latNew{<Double>} new value of point’s latitude
